Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The lacings down the back of the corset to keep it tightly fitted.
The lacings on the back of the corset.

Base:InitialProperties.Base:InitialProperty: "set this.zcode to \$lookup(Generic:DB:CodeDB) :: set this.zdata to \$lookup(Generic:DB:DataDB) :: set this.zcnt to 1 :: set this.zmax to \$element(this.zdata,#inherits,0)"
"It's a woman's shaping undergarment, stretching from the waist and over the chest. Small hooks fasten round the front, and tight lacings line the back."

"

"emit.actor \

The current \$prop(this.tname) is [\$prop(this.tnow)]."

"set this.tnow to this.trait:\$prop(this.tname) :: set this.tnow to \$prop(\$prop(this.tnow)) :: if \$prop(this.tnow) \<\> \$prop(this.oname) then goto 0260"

"set this.tmax to nil :: set this.tcnt to nil :: set this.tname to nil :: set this.omax to nil :: set this.ocnt to nil :: set this.tline to nil :: set this.ttemp to nil :: set this.tnow to nil :: set this.xtrait to nil :: set this.xvalue to nil :: set this.tdetail to nil :: set this.tally to nil :: set this.level to nil :: return"

"if \$prop(this.trait:editor) \<\> nobody then emit.actor \
Last edited by: \$prop(this.trait:editor)"

"set this.ttemp to \$lowercase(\$prop(this.trait:skillname)) :: emit.actor \
To alter this item, use the syntax: \$prop(this.ttemp) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) \\"[trait] [value]\\". Example: \$prop(this.ttemp) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) \\"\$prop(this.xtrait) \$prop(this.xvalue)\\""

"set this.tnow to this.trait:\$prop(this.tname) :: set this.xtrait to \$prop(this.tname) :: set this.xvalue to \$element(this,#\$prop(this.xtrait),2) :: if \$prop(this.xvalue) = \$prop(this.tnow) then set this.xvalue to \$element(this,#\$prop(this.xtrait),3)"

"emit.actor You cannot do that while \$brief(this) is being worn. :: exit false"
"It's a woman's shaping undergarment, stretching from the waist and over the chest. Small hooks fasten round the front, and tight lacings line the back."
"A plain corset. It's a woman's shaping undergarment, stretching from the waist and over the chest. Small hooks fasten round the front, and tight lacings line the back."
